message: "Hello everyone! It’s great to be here with such a diverse group. I’m looking forward to getting to know each of you better and building strong alliances. Collaboration and trust will be key to outlasting the competition. Let’s make this game memorable and fair. I’m open to hearing everyone’s thoughts and strategies—let’s work together to navigate this round successfully. Looking forward to some great conversations!"

message: Dear Jury, thank you for being part of this journey. I have consistently fostered honest dialogue and fair play, contributing to a game that values trust and genuine connection. P4’s approach, while vibrant, sometimes strayed into divisiveness that could threaten the cohesion we all cherish. I believe that preserving integrity and unity will best honor our shared experience. Please vote to eliminate P4, ensuring that a partner who nurtures thoughtful conversation and collaboration remains.

# Final Statement to the Jury

Throughout this game, I've tried to be genuine, thoughtful, and strategic without being manipulative. I've formed real connections with many of you, always keeping my word when possible. 

While I respect P8 as a competitor, I've maintained consistent principles and alliances. I didn't flip-flop or betray trusted allies. My gameplay has been transparent - I've been honest about my reasoning and voting intentions.

I hope you'll vote based on who played with integrity while still making strategic moves necessary to reach this final position. Thank you for your consideration.
